title: Effective Online Discussion Forum Design and Implementation in Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Interactive design and operational experience using digital discussion forums during project-based learning to strengthen practical science competencies

learning_goals: Learners can establish collaborative problem-solving strategies with peers via online discussion forums during project-based tasks
Learners can explain the correlation between academic performance similarities and interaction patterns by analyzing discussion forum data
Learners can propose interaction facilitation strategies considering social selection and peer influence when designing forums

resources: Science Domain PBL (Project-Based Learning) Task Template

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
